name: Trident Temple
description:
NOTE : If you're rating the game for the jam, please play the web version or download the original jam version

C / K to change direction

X / L to jump

Hold X / L to glide and attack downwards

Your health will drain. Kill enemies to replenish it

After a wave is over, your remaining health points will be added to your score

Like what you see ? :)

Follow me on Twitter Join our Discord
